TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollItemPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示支持 控件模式的容器的子控件。

span.span: Represents child controls of containers that support the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅[UI 自动化客户端的控件模式映射](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)有关的可以实现此控件模式的控件示例。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 模式标识符传递到方法，如若要从指定检索控件模式感兴趣的。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式的均来自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ScrollIntoView() cil managed

summary.span: 滚动容器对象的内容区域，以便在容器可见区域（视区）中显示 。

span.span: Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the within the visible region (viewport) of the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不提供能够指定的位置容器的可见区域 （视区） 中。This method does not provide the ability to specify the position of the within the visible region (viewport) of the container. ## Examples 在下面的示例中， ，或事件处理程序已声明，尝试向下滚动到其容器控件的可视区域的对象。In the following example, a , or event handler has been declared that attempts to scroll a object into the viewable region of its container control. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollItemPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollItemPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollItemPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollItemPattern_snippets.vb#100)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollItemPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollItemPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

exception.span: 未能将项滚动到视区中。

span.span: The item could not be scrolled into view.
